trans-unit.source: Represents a composite geometry, composed of other <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示包含其他 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 物件的複合幾何。

trans-unit.source: Composite geometry objects can be created using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>, or by calling the static <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> method <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用建立複合幾何物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>、 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>，或藉由呼叫靜態<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> creates a composite geometry from exactly two geometry objects.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>從兩個 geometry 物件建立的複合幾何。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>, on the other hand, creates a composite geometry from any number of geometry objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>，相反地，從任何數目的幾何物件中建立的複合幾何。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup.FillRule%2A> property to specify how its geometry objects are combined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup> 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup.FillRule%2A>屬性來指定如何結合其 geometry 物件。

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Control the Fill of a Composite Shape](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-the-fill-of-a-composite-shape.md) for more information on using <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup.FillRule%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[如何： 控制複合形狀的填滿](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-the-fill-of-a-composite-shape.md)如需有關使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup.FillRule%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Geometries can be combined in several ways: using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>, or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> class.
trans-unit.target: 幾何可以結合數種方式： 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>、 <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>類別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup> creates a composite geometry from one or more <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> objects.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>從一或多個建立的複合幾何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> uses a specified boolean operation to combine the area described by two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> objects.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>會使用指定的布林運算結合兩個所描述的區域<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>物件。

trans-unit.source: The static <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> class behaves in exactly the same manner as the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry> object.
trans-unit.target: 靜態<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>類別行為完全相同的方式為<xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry>物件。

trans-unit.source: It is worth noting that a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryCollection> is not itself a composite geometry, but is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup> class to store <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> objects.
trans-unit.target: 值得注意的是<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryCollection>不本身的複合幾何，但正由<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>類別來儲存<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryCollection" /> that contains the objects that define this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryCollection" />，其中包含定義這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: A collection containing the children of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 集合，其中包含這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" /> 的子系。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup.Children" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup.Children" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how the intersecting areas of the objects contained in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" /> are combined.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" /> 內含物件之交集區域的組合方式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the intersecting areas are combined to form the resulting area.
trans-unit.target: 指定交集區域的合併方式以形成產生的區域。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>EvenOdd</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>EvenOdd</c>。

trans-unit.source: **EvenOdd** Determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and counting the number of path segments from the given shape that the ray crosses.
trans-unit.target: **EvenOdd**會從該點朝任意方向繪製無限遠，並且計算給定圖案與光線相交的路徑線段數目來判斷"「 向內程度 」 的圖形上的點。

trans-unit.source: If this number is odd, the point is inside; if even, the point is outside.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個數字是奇數，該點即是在區域內；如為偶數，該點即在區域外。

trans-unit.source: **NonZero** Determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and then examining the places where a segment of the shape crosses the ray.
trans-unit.target: **為非零，** "朝 」 圖形上的某個點決定從該點朝任意方向繪製無限遠，然後檢查圖案線段與光線相交的地方。

trans-unit.source: Starting with a count of zero, add one each time a Segment crosses the ray from left to right and subtract one each time a path segment crosses the ray from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 從零開始計算，路徑線段每次從左到右與光線交會就加一，每次從右到左與光線交會就減一。

trans-unit.source: After counting the crossings, if the result is zero then the point is outside the path.
trans-unit.target: 計算交會後，如果結果為零，則點即在路徑外。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is inside.
trans-unit.target: 否則就在路徑內。

trans-unit.source: ![Fill rule illustration](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "Fill rule illustration")
trans-unit.target: ![填滿規則圖例](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "填滿規則圖例")

trans-unit.target: FillRule 範例

trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup.FillRule" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup.FillRule" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" /> object is empty.
trans-unit.target: 判斷這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" /> 物件是否空白。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" /> is empty; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: 若這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" /> 是空的則為 **true**否則為 **false**。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" /> object may have curved segments.
trans-unit.target: 判斷這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" /> 物件是否可以具有弧形片段。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" /> object may have curved segments; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: 若這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup" /> 物件可以具有弧形片段，則為 **true**；否則為 **false**。
